ai.summary: Gourley's Loanin is a very short, easy hike in the United Kingdom, covering about 0.8 km. The route is beginner-friendly and typically completes in around 10–15 minutes at a relaxed pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat with well-maintained paths. Surfaces may be compacted earth or grass; elevation gain is minimal. Expect occasional damp patches in wetter weather.
ai.safety_notes: - Check local weather and daylight hours before setting out. - Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear and dress in layers. - Stay on marked paths and respect any private property or livestock. - Carry a small amount of water, a charged phone, and a basic map or offline route. - Be mindful of other hikers; paths can be shared and surface can be slippery in wet or icy conditions.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map and emergency contacts
Sunscreen and hat for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are typically the most comfortable; winter hikes are possible with appropriate gear and daylight.

seo.title: Gourley's Loanin – Easy 0.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Gourley's Loanin, a short and easy 0.8 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families, with practical safety tips and gear suggestions.
